attributes.action: Implement a temporarily raised limit to contactless payments during pandemic.
attributes.additional_details: This will reduce the need for physical contact with chip and pin machines and may help slow the spread of the virus.
attributes.background: Raise the limit for contactless payments to £100 or £200 during the outbreak of Covid-19.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The contactless payment limit is set by banks.
